title: Bruno Reis
text:
Bruno Miguel Carapeto Reis (born 20 July 1999) is a Portuguese <a href="Association%20football">footballer</a> who plays as a <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> for the Under-23 squad of <a href="Portimonense%20S.C.">Portimonense</a>.
Club career.
Reis signed his first professional contract with his childhood club <a href="Portimonense%20S.C.">Portimonense S.C.</a> on 2 November 2017. Reis made his professional debut for Portimonense in a 2-0 <a href="Primeira%20Liga">Primeira Liga</a> loss to <a href="Vit%C3%B3ria%20S.C.">Vitória S.C.</a> on 16 February 2019.
